q: of responsibility and accountability at the top.`` As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated,'' Mr Eric Schmidt said in a posting on the company's official blog. So Larry, Sergey[ Brin] and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making. Mr Eric Schmidt became chief executive in 2001 to bring more management experience to the growing company. Clearly, this was not the case in this situation and one without my knowledge or approval, he said. With the dismissal of one rumor came the start of another, as many supporters now believe the Columbus, Ind., born and raised congressman may seek a shot at the governor's mansion. In the months ahead, as we attend to our duties in Congress, we will also be traveling across the state to listen and learn about how Hoosiers think we might best contribute in the years ahead, Mike Pence said.`` After taking time to listen to Hoosiers, we will make a decision later this year about what role we will seek to play.'' , Peter Rice confirmed there would be four judges on the show, two men and two women, but insisted Simon Cowell would not be making the final decision on who would appear on it. He said: There's great speculation. I think Simon Cowell is still meeting and trying to find the right mixture. It'll be four judges as it is in England- it's two men, two women, one of which will be Simon Cowell .'`` Simon Cowell 's going to come to us and he's going to say,` This is who I would like the judges to be,' and we'll have a conversation about it. Peter Rice also claimed the show would be different from` American Idol' because of the involvement of judges with their acts, meaning they could find the next`` Stevie Wonder or Michael Jackson ''. The software vendor said today that it has promoted its senior veep Satya Nadella to the position left vacant by Muglia. Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future, said Steve Ballmer . reported that Microsoft was set to undergo a radical reshuffle of its management team.
